channel.title: Blogs on Sydney Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Sydney Pham

item.title: Graduation!
item.description: In less than 5 days I will be officially finsihed with college! It feels like just yesterday I was sitting for the first time in my introductory general chemistry course in a lecture hall with more students in it than my entire high school graduating class. Three and a half years later I can say that I’ve learned quite a bit academically and about myself. Next semester I plan to work and travel before starting dental school in August!

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: I was first introduced to python just a few weeks ago! I wanted to make a blog post showing some basic python commands that I’ve learned. I’ve always wanted to travel to Fiji, so I decided to use the R dataset “quakes” that has the locations of 1000 seismic events that occured near Fiji. In this dataset, the variables are latitude of event (lat), longitude (long), depth (depth), and magnitude on the Richter Scale (mag).
